version_description:
This is one of our biggest updates yet!

* We have updated the design of walking tracks and paths on the map. Now, paths and trails stand out more, making it easier to navigate on foot or on bike or to find and plan your next adventure around the corner.
* You will now see a red halo around your position. This is always pointing in the direction you're facing, so you'll never be confused at a complicated crossroads.
* Press the 'my location' button to go to your current location. This, by default, will lock the map to this position, so that when you move, the map will move with you.
* Press the 'my location' button a second time to activate the 'heading' mode, where the map will point in the direction you're travelling.
* The map now loads much faster when using the map or downloading maps for offline use.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback.

* Fixed a bug that was causing the share and map buttons to disappear from the adventure detail view.
* Fixed a page scrolling problem on the adventure detail view.
* Crash fixes and stability improvements.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback. And if you love FATMAP, please consider leaving us a review.

Looking for adventure? Check out what’s new in our latest update...

- Discover lakes, huts and other points of interest with the improved search bar!
- Quickly find old searches in your history
- Easily browse with search scroll

Plus, we’re always working on performance and stability in the background to ensure you can always find your next adventure.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback. And if you love FATMAP, please consider leaving us a review.

Discover, plan and experience the best of outdoor adventure.

This update fixes an issue that was causing a crash for some users.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback. And if you love FATMAP, please consider leaving us a review.

In this update...
- Your custom adventures now load faster than ever!
- Known bugs causing performance issues have been fixed.

Discover, plan and experience the best of outdoor adventure this winter.

Great new updates this week:
* New Snow Layers! As well as Snow Depth, you can now see Fresh Snow, and Snow Forecast, layers on the map. (Explore members only)
* Explore the world as if you were there with the new 360° View! Simply drop a waypoint and tap the 360° View button to see your surroundings from that exact position.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback. And if you love FATMAP, please consider leaving us a review.

Discover, plan and experience the best of outdoor adventure this winter.

Great new updates this week:
* Discover more Adventure than ever before! You can now see recommended routes for 15 new activities, including Resort Ski Touring, Snowshoeing, Trail Running and more!
* Keep your offline maps up to date with Map Updates.
* You can now filter by difficulty, making it easy to find the right route for you.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback. And if you love FATMAP, please consider leaving us a review.

* The Adventure List should load a LOT faster now.
* Fixed an issue where your current location wasn't updating regularly while you were moving.
* Other bug fixes and performance improvements.

Welcome to the brand new FATMAP App!

* The brand new Home feed is your daily source of outdoor inspiration. Follow activity from friends, athletes and local experts, discover new routes nearby, or catch up on the latest outdoor news.
* Search has received a complete overhaul, making it simple to find the best routes, wherever you are.
* Viewing adventures near you on the map has been streamlined - just hit the Activity button on the Map to view and filter routes.
* And much, much more!

Have the perfect mountain adventure FATMAP! New this week:
* When viewing a route, tap the map to dive deeper and browse waypoints along the way.
* Support added for LifePass connected ski passes - Winter is coming!
* Bug fixes, UI and stability improvements.

We love feedback! Use the feedback link in the app to send us feedback. And if you love FATMAP, please consider leaving us a review.

Have the perfect mountain adventure with FATMAP! New this week...

** Navigation Mode - FATMAP now locks onto the route you're following so you can easily check if you're still on track!
** LifePass - Connect any LifePass device to the FATMAP app and see its location live on the map
** Community Search - Find your friends by simply typing their name into the search bar
** Edit Profile - You can now update your profile information from the mobile app

Have the perfect mountain adventure with FATMAP!

*New this week*
- Climbing crags are now discoverable on the map
- See the distance from your current location on waypoints
- Lots of under-the-hood updates to improve your overall experience

Fingers crossed we can all get some skiing in this season!

- Lots of under-the-hood updates to improve your overall app experience

Still crossing those fingers hoping we all can get some skiing done this season!

Have the perfect mountain adventure with FATMAP!

New this week...
* Finding your location has been fixed
* Object privacy settings can now be changed in bulk

- You can now record your adventure in FATMAP!
- Explore members can now export Adventures to their Suunto account

- You can now record your adventures with FATMAP!
- Explore members can now export Adventures to their Suunto account
- One-finger zoom! Double tap and drag to zoom in and out!
- See the latest activity near you with new adventures added daily

- New feed loading animation
- Updated narrative line for Adventures in the activity tab
- Updated Guidebook cards on profiles
- Fixed the legend for distance layer
- Recording distance is now measured in miles even if under 1 mile

- We've made a few changes to the Activity Feed. Check out the latest routes in your area submitted by the awesome FATMAP community!
- Plus the usual under the hood improvements to ensure everything is running smoothly
- Just lots of fixes to keep your FATMAP app running smoothly
